Got this for my daughter bc i knew she would like it.
Had to return this item as it arrived with the handle broken off.  Smaller size than expected.  Did not reorder as was concerned about quality.

Love it.  It was a perfect embellishment for my Draculaura cosplay!  It help up very well for the day while i was at comicon. No problems opening and closing even after pearls were glued to the scallop points
Very good quality, good size.
Perfect for what I need it for. It even has an excellent carrying “case” with strap on it. The look is perfect for my Harley Quinn circus cosplay.

I hate being caught in the rain, but I keep wishing for rain just so I can use it! It comes with a convenient little bag with a strap, so it doesn't drip everywhere when you go inside, and the shape does a pretty good job of blocking rain when it's windy.

I love the style of the umbrella. It’s pretty decent quality too. It feels pretty sturdy. I did think it would be a little wider when opened. My daughter is 3 in the picture and I wouldn’t say the umbrella is way too big for her. I’m on the petite side (5’1) and it’s perfect for me.

评论概述: Super cute. But kind of small
评论详情: It’s adorable. Let me begin there. However smaller than I had anticipated. It is a one person umbrella. As long as you pay attention enough to keep yourself under it you should stay dry.

评论详情: Well made beautiful, but it is not full sized, childlike with a long handle, ok for cos play indoors, but won't cover an adult in a down pour.
Super cute.  Love it.
Everything in this umbrella is amazing🖤
Used as a Halloween decoration. Not sure how it works in the rain, but it is very easy to open and sturdy.

评论概述: Just but it so well made and unique!
评论详情: I bought this umbrella cause I needed one for my costume and also needed a functional umbrella in the house cause all our current umbrellas are broken. So I chose to get this to solve Botha issues. I just love steampunk gothic & Victorian styling. It was a better quality than I ever expected and now everyone wants to get one. I am thinking of getting another one in other colors so my family won’t take this one. As we usually have 3-4 umbrellas in the umbrella holder and the others are broken. It is a beautiful well-made strong design of quality material. Almost everyone who saw it loved it as well. If I knew it would be this nice I would have bought 2 other colors. It is worth every penny and I will be buying another color to mix things up. The delivery was on time and everything went smoothly.

评论概述: Strong and beautiful. Lots of compliments
评论详情: This is a lovely and durable umbrella. I am using it for Halloween decor and it is the only umbrella among the 6 different kinds that hasn't flipped inside out in the strong winds. Ended up getting it in another color as well.
I’m in love 🖤. It’s exactly what I was looking for. It goes with everything
It came broken! Don’t buy!

Well made, cute, exactly as pictured.  A little smaller than expected,  but not tiny. Brilliant colors and very sturdy. 5/5 stars.

Love the bat wings with the pagoda style.. Love it! Great size. It is not small like some reviews.  Wish it came with a sleeve, but I  love it and will buy another when available.  Please keep making black but a cheetah print would be fantastic. Great price for what this is.

I have a collection of umbrellas and this is at the top! So unique in resign, very high quality, easy to operate, sturdy, an excellent value for the price! I love the comments generated when people see it.

Smaller than I anticipated, more like a parasol than a traditional size umbrella. The “latch” is pretty tight & can be difficult to open, but hopefully that will ease up with more use.
